alert.note: Alert for Gregg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 12:35PM CST until January 27 at 5:21PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Rabbit Creek At Kilgore affecting Gregg County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...No flooding is currently forecast. * WHERE...Rabbit Creek at Kilgore. * WHEN...Until tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Expect lowland flooding of timber resources in and near the creek. Some oil field operations may be affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 7.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 8.1 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 1245 PM CST.
